data.name: Organisation_EnterOrganisationName_Buyer_Hint
data.value: If you’re a department, agency or public body on the GOV.UK organisations list (opens in a new tab), use the exact name shown. If not, use your full official name. For example, HM Revenue & Customs not HMRC.

data.name: Organisation_EnterOrganisationName_Supplier_Hint
data.value: As registered on Companies House if incorporated, or the trading name of the company.

data.name: Supplementary_PrivacyNotice_Title
data.value: Privacy notice: how we use your data

data.name: Supplementary_PrivacyNotice_Intro
data.value: GOV.UK Digital Service Platform is provided by Government Digital Service (GDS), which is part of the Cabinet Office. The data controller for GDS is the Cabinet Office. A data controller determines how and why personal data can be processed.

data.name: Supplementary_PrivacyNotice_ReadMore
data.value: Read the Cabinet Office’s entry in the Data Protection Public Register for more information.

data.name: Supplementary_PageNotFound_TypedAddress
data.value: If you typed the web address, check it is correct.

data.name: Supplementary_PageNotFound_PastedAddress
data.value: If you pasted the web address, check you copied the entire address.

data.name: Supplementary_Index_Title
data.value: Register your details as a buyer or supplier of procurements

data.name: Supplementary_Index_UnableToAuthenticate
data.value: Unable to authenticate user, please retry

data.name: Supplementary_Index_Intro
data.value: The Central Digital Platform (CDP) service is for both procurement professionals and suppliers in the UK's public and utilities sectors.

data.name: Supplementary_Index_UseService
data.value: Use the service if you are:

data.name: Supplementary_Index_ContractingAuthority
data.value: a contracting authority working in procurement who buys goods, works, and services, supplies them, or both

data.name: Supplementary_Index_Organisation
data.value: an organisation or sole trader who applies for contracts to supply goods, works, and services

data.name: Supplementary_Index_CreateLogin
data.value: You will first create GOV.UK One Login or sign in.

data.name: Supplementary_Index_AlreadyRegistered
data.value: If your organisation is already registered

data.name: Supplementary_Index_SignIn
data.value: You can sign in to your account.

data.name: Supplementary_Error_Title
data.value: Sorry, there is a problem with the service

data.name: Supplementary_ContactUs_SupportTeam
data.value: Our support team will contact you by email, Monday to Friday from 9am to 5pm, excluding bank holidays.

data.name: Supplementary_ContactUs_Email_ValidationErrorMessage
data.value: Enter an email address in the correct format, like name@example.com

data.name: Supplementary_ContactUs_Message_ValidationErrorMessage
data.value: Message must be between 10 and 10,000 characters

data.name: Supplementary_CookieDetails_Title
data.value: Details about cookies on Find a Tender

data.name: Supplementary_CookieDetails_Intro
data.value: Find a Tender puts small files (known as ‘cookies’) onto your computer to collect information about how you browse the site. Find out more about the cookies we use, what they’re for and when they expire.

data.name: Supplementary_CookieDetails_GoogleAnalytics
data.value: We use Google Analytics software (Universal Analytics) to collect anonymised information about how you use Find a Tender. We do this to help make sure the site is meeting the needs of its users and to help us make improvements to the site.

data.name: Supplementary_CookieDetails_NoGoogleShare
data.value: We do not allow Google to use or share the data about how you use this site.

data.name: Supplementary_CookieDetails_ListItem1
data.value: how you got to the site

data.name: Supplementary_CookieDetails_ListItem2
data.value: the pages you visit on GOV.UK and how long you spend on them

data.name: Supplementary_CookieDetails_ListItem3
data.value: what you click on while you’re visiting the site

data.name: Supplementary_CookieDetails_ListItem4
data.value: Google Analytics sets the following cookies.

data.name: Supplementary_CookieDetails_SignedInInfo
data.value: When you sign in to the service, we’ll set cookies to keep you signed in as you use the site. These cookies do not store your personal data and are deleted when you close your browser.

data.name: Supplementary_CookieDetails_BannerInfo
data.value: You may see banners when you visit Find a Tender inviting you to select your cookie preferences. We’ll set cookies so that your computer knows you’ve seen such messages and not to show them again, and also to store your settings.

data.name: Supplementary_CookieDetails_ChangeSettingsInfo
data.value: You can change which cookies you're happy for us to use.

data.name: Supplementary_CookieDetails_TableRow_GA
data.value: This cookie is used with Google Universal Analytics. This cookie allows Google to track unique users via a client identifier that is randomly generated

data.name: Supplementary_CookieDetails_TableRow_GAT
data.value: This cookie is used with Google Universal Analytics. This cookie is used to monitor and track visitors’ behaviour on the site anonymously

data.name: Supplementary_CookieDetails_TableRow_GID
data.value: This cookie is used with Google Universal Analytics. This cookie is used to group the user behaviour

data.name: Supplementary_CookieDetails_TableRow_Antiforgery
data.value: This cookie keeps the service secure, preventing cross-site forgery requests.

data.name: Supplementary_CookieDetails_TableRow_Cookies
data.value: Stores details of the currently authenticated user.

data.name: Supplementary_CookieDetails_TableRow_Culture
data.value: Stores the currently selected language requirement.

data.name: Supplementary_CookieDetails_TableRow_Preferences
data.value: Stores the cookies accept / reject preference.

data.name: Supplementary_Cookies_Intro1
data.value: Cookies are files saved on your phone, tablet or computer when you visit a website.

data.name: Supplementary_Cookies_Intro2
data.value: We use cookies to store information about how you use the Find a Tender website, such as the pages you visit.

data.name: Supplementary_Cookies_Settings_Intro
data.value: We use 2 types of cookie. You can choose which types you’re happy for us to use, except for those that are essential.

data.name: Supplementary_Cookies_GoogleAnalytics
data.value: We use Google Analytics to measure how you use the website so we can improve it based on user needs. We do not allow Google to use or share the data about how you use this site.

data.name: Supplementary_Cookies_GoogleAnalyticsInfo
data.value: Google Analytics sets cookies that store anonymised information about:

data.name: Supplementary_Cookies_ListItem1
data.value: how you got to the site

data.name: Supplementary_Cookies_ListItem2
data.value: the pages you visit on Find a Tender and how long you spend on each page

data.name: Supplementary_Cookies_ListItem3
data.value: what you click on while you’re visiting the site

data.name: Supplementary_Cookies_UseCookies
data.value: Use cookies that measure my website use

data.name: Supplementary_Cookies_DoNotUseCookies
data.value: Do not use cookies that measure my website use

data.name: Supplementary_Cookies_StrictlyNecessary_Info1
data.value: These essential cookies do things like remember when you are signed in, the language you want to view the site in, and the notifications you’ve seen so we do not show them to you again.

data.name: Supplementary_Cookies_StrictlyNecessary_Info2
data.value: They always need to be on.

data.name: Supplementary_Cookies_FindOutMore
data.value: Find out more about cookies on Find a Tender

data.name: Supplementary_Cookies_GovServices_Info
data.value: Most services we link to are run by different government departments, for example DWP’s Universal Credit online, DVLA’s vehicle tax service, or HMRC’s webchat. These services may set additional cookies and, if so, will have their own cookie policy and banner linking to it.

data.name: Supplier_ConnectedEntity_Address_EnterRegisteredAddress_Hint
data.value: The address registered with Companies House, or the principal address the business conducts its activities. For example, a head office.

data.name: Supplier_ConnectedEntity_ConnectedEntityCompanyInsolvencyDate_Hint
data.value:
The date it stopped trading under its own name.

For example, 27 03 2007

data.name: Supplier_ConnectedEntity_ConnectedEntityCompanyInsolvencyDate_DateInFuture
data.value: Date of insolvency must be today or in the past

data.name: Supplier_ConnectedEntity_ConnectedEntityCompanyQuestion_Hint
data.value: Is the ‘connected person’ registered with Companies House as required by the Companies Act 2006.

data.name: Supplier_ConnectedEntity_ConnectedEntityControlCondition_Heading
data.value: Which specified conditions of control does {0} have?

data.name: Supplier_ConnectedEntity_ConnectedEntityControlCondition_Hint
data.value: As defined in part 1 schedule 1a of the Companies Act 2006. Select all that apply.

data.name: Supplier_ConnectedEntity_ConnectedEntityControlCondition_OwnsSharesHint
data.value: Directly or indirectly holds more than 25% of the company's shares

data.name: Supplier_ConnectedEntity_ConnectedEntityControlCondition_HasVotingRightsHint
data.value: Directly or indirectly holds more than 25% of the voting rights in the company

data.name: Supplier_ConnectedEntity_ConnectedEntityControlCondition_CanAppointOrRemoveDirectorsHint
data.value: Directly or indirectly holds the right to appoint or remove a majority of the company's board of directors

data.name: Supplier_ConnectedEntity_ConnectedEntityControlCondition_HasOtherSignificantInfluenceOrControlLabel
data.value: Has other significant influence or control

data.name: Supplier_ConnectedEntity_ConnectedEntityControlCondition_HasOtherSignificantInfluenceOrControlHint
data.value: Has the right to exercise, or exercises, significant influence or control over the company. As defined in the person of significant control (PSC) guidance.

data.name: Supplier_ConnectedEntity_ConnectedEntityDeclaration_Paragraph1
data.value: A ‘connected person’ is someone who influences or controls your company.

data.name: Supplier_ConnectedEntity_ConnectedEntityDeclaration_Paragraph2
data.value: It includes people with significant control (opens in new tab) and any other individual or company other than yourself that has a declarable interest in your organisation.

data.name: Supplier_ConnectedEntity_ConnectedEntityDeclaration_Paragraph3
data.value: For example, a director, a trust, a majority shareholder or a parent or subsidiary company.

data.name: Supplier_ConnectedEntity_ConnectedEntityDirectorResidency_Heading
data.value: What country does {0} usually live in?

data.name: Supplier_ConnectedEntity_ConnectedEntityCompanyRegisterName_Heading
data.value: Select where {0} is registered as person with significant control

data.name: Supplier_ConnectedEntity_ConnectedEntityCompanyRegisterName_CompaniesHouseOption
data.value: People with significant control register on Companies House

data.name: Supplier_ConnectedEntity_ConnectedEntityLawRegister_LegalFormationHint
data.value: When it was set up and registered, what structure was used. Also called trading status. For example, a limited company or limited liability partnership.

data.name: Supplier_ConnectedEntity_ConnectedEntityLegalFormQuestion_Hint
data.value: In the UK, this is a business structure or trading status. For example, limited company or limited liability partnership.

data.name: Supplier_ConnectedEntity_ConnectedEntityOrganisationCategory_PageTitle
data.value: Select the category that best describes the 'connected person'

data.name: Supplier_ConnectedEntity_ConnectedEntityOrganisationCategory_Hint
data.value: The ‘connected person’ that has control or influence over your organisation should fall into one of these categories.

data.name: Supplier_ConnectedEntity_ConnectedEntityOrganisationCategory_Option_Director
data.value: director or organisation with the same responsibilities

data.name: Supplier_ConnectedEntity_ConnectedEntityOrganisationCategory_Option_CompanyTakenOver
data.value: a company your organisation has taken over

data.name: Supplier_ConnectedEntity_ConnectedEntityOrganisationCategory_Option_OrgWithSignificantControl
data.value: any other organisation with significant influence or control

data.name: Supplier_ConnectedEntity_ConnectedEntityPostalSameAsRegisteredAddress_PageTitle
data.value: Does {0} have a different postal address?

data.name: Supplier_ConnectedEntity_ConnectedEntityPostalSameAsRegisteredAddress_Hint
data.value: The place where an organisation receives official post can be different from its registered address. For example, a branch office.

data.name: Supplier_ConnectedEntity_ConnectedEntityPscDetails_DateOfBirthDayRequiredError
data.value: Date of birth must include a day

data.name: Supplier_ConnectedEntity_ConnectedEntityPscDetails_DateOfBirthDayInvalidError
data.value: Day must be a valid number

data.name: Supplier_ConnectedEntity_ConnectedEntityPscDetails_DateOfBirthMonthRequiredError
data.value: Date of birth must include a month

data.name: Supplier_ConnectedEntity_ConnectedEntityPscDetails_DateOfBirthMonthInvalidError
data.value: Month must be a valid number

data.name: Supplier_ConnectedEntity_ConnectedEntityPscDetails_DateOfBirthYearRequiredError
data.value: Date of birth must include a year

data.name: Supplier_ConnectedEntity_ConnectedEntityPscDetails_DateOfBirthYearInvalidError
data.value: Year must be a valid number

data.name: Supplier_ConnectedEntity_ConnectedEntityRegistrationDateQuestion_DayRequiredError
data.value: Date of registration must include a day

data.name: Supplier_ConnectedEntity_ConnectedEntityRegistrationDateQuestion_DayInvalidError
data.value: Day must be a valid number

data.name: Supplier_ConnectedEntity_ConnectedEntityRegistrationDateQuestion_MonthRequiredError
data.value: Date of registration must include a month

data.name: Supplier_ConnectedEntity_ConnectedEntityRegistrationDateQuestion_MonthInvalidError
data.value: Month must be a valid number

data.name: Supplier_ConnectedEntity_ConnectedEntityRegistrationDateQuestion_YearRequiredError
data.value: Date of registration must include a year

data.name: Supplier_ConnectedEntity_ConnectedEntityRegistrationDateQuestion_YearInvalidError
data.value: Year must be a valid number

data.name: Supplier_ConnectedEntity_ConnectedEntityRegistrationDateQuestion_DateInvalidError
data.value: Date of registration must be a real date

data.name: Supplier_ConnectedEntity_ConnectedEntityRegistrationDateQuestion_DateInFutureError
data.value: Date of registration must be today or in the past

data.name: Supplier_ConnectedEntity_ConnectedEntityRegistrationDateQuestion_Heading
data.value: Were you required to register {0} as a person with significant control?

data.name: Supplier_ConnectedEntity_ConnectedEntityRegistrationDateQuestion_Hint
data.value: In the UK this is defined by section 790C(4) of the Companies Act 2006 (opens in new tab)

data.name: Supplier_ConnectedEntity_ConnectedEntityRemoveConfirmation_PageTitle

data.name: Supplier_ConnectedEntity_ConnectedEntityRemoveConfirmation_ConfirmRemoveError
data.value: Select yes to confirm removal of the connected person

data.name: Supplier_ConnectedEntity_ConnectedEntityRemoveConfirmation_EndDateLabel

data.name: Supplier_ConnectedEntity_ConnectedEntityRemoveConfirmation_DayRequiredError

data.name: Supplier_ConnectedEntity_ConnectedEntityRemoveConfirmation_DateInvalidError

data.value: Is your organisation registered with Companies House?

data.name: Supplier_ConnectedEntity_ConnectedEntitySupplierCompanyQuestion_Hint
data.value: Is the supplier organisation registered with Companies House as required by the Companies Act 2006? We’ve already asked you this, but please reconfirm.

data.name: Supplier_ConnectedEntity_ConnectedEntitySupplierHasControl_PageTitle
data.value: Is your organisation influenced or controlled by another person or company?

data.name: Supplier_ConnectedEntity_ConnectedPersonSummary_AddAnotherConnectedPersonError

data.name: Supplier_ConnectedEntity_ConnectedEntityCompanyRegistrationDate_Heading

For example, 27 03 2007

data.value: Select the category that best describes the 'connected person'

data.name: Supplier_ConnectedEntity_ConnectedEntityPersonType_Hint
data.value: A ‘connected person’ can be an individual, organisation or trustee or trust.

data.name: ApiKeyManagement_RevokeApiKey_Description1
data.value: Cancelling this API key will stop the sharing of information between this service and the eSender that's using it.

data.name: ApiKeyManagement_RevokeApiKey_Description2
data.value: You cannot re-activate a cancelled API key. You'll need to create a new one to share information again.

data.name: ApiKeyManagement_NewApiKeyDetails_CopyApiKey
data.value: Copy the API key and keep it safe.

data.name: ApiKeyManagement_NewApiKeyDetails_Notice
data.value: This is the only time we show you the API key. If you lose it, you’ll need to cancel it and create a new one.

data.name: ApiKeyManagement_ManageApiKey_NoKeysText
data.value: API keys that you create will be listed here.

data.name: ApiKeyManagement_ManageApiKey_Description
data.value: View your active and cancelled API keys.

data.name: ApiKeyManagement_ManageApiKey_Description_Editor
data.value: You can cancel any that are no longer needed.

data.name: ApiKeyManagement_CreateApiKey_Hint
data.value: For security we only show the API key once on the confirmation page. Add a name for reference. For example, the name of the eSender it's for.
